text: I think ABBA have a pure joy to their music and that's what makes them extraordinary.
author: Bono

text: Great classic music that I've been turned on to has not only inspired and influenced me, but it has had an effect on my songwriting.
author: Scott Weiland

text: The great moments of rock 'n' roll were never off in some corner of the music world, in a self-constructed ghetto.
author: Bono

text: If you pour some music on whatever's wrong, it'll sure help out.
author: Levon Helm
